thread.section_title: Mattress.ie Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mattress.ie | mattress.ie
thread.title: Paul McCaffrey

author: Paul McCaffrey
title: Paul McCaffrey
text: I could not be happier with my purchase from Mattress.ie. I do not normally put up a review, but on this occasion I had to let you know how delighted I was with my experience. Your Sales Advisor and driver was helpful and polite, the mattress was exceptional value and the product was exactly what I wanted. Thanks again, I will recommend you to all of my friends and will be back to you in the future :)
